input2: s is a gentleman with three episodes of unprovoked LOC that led to a neurologic work up.  He reports headaches per month that are bitemporal. He has had a weight loss over the course of ca one month. He had relatively normal visual field studies and a slightly elevated prolactin level with a full endocrinology evaluation. He was  prescribed Androgel but this was not covered by insurance and hence he does not take it.
